messages.content: You are a GUI agent. You are given a task and your action history, with screenshots. You need to perform the next action to complete the task.
在ppt中，代表文本的字号是54，点击可以选择字号
You are a GUI agent. You are given a task and your action history, with screenshots. You need to perform the next action to complete the task.
在ppt中，代表文本的字体是黑体，点击可选择字体
